item.title: about
item.description:
Biography

I am currently a Ph.D. student in the Department of Computer Science at the University of Virginia. My advisor is Professor Haiying Shen. From 2012 to 2016, I was a Graduate Research Assistant in the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at the Clemson University, USA. I received the B.E. degree in Optical Engineering from Zhejiang University, China in 2010, and the M.S. degree in Electrical Engineering from University of Southern California, USA in 2012.

item.title: research
item.description:
My research interests include Computer Networks, Cloud Computing, Big Data, and Distributed Systems. My current research focuses on analytical frameworks for big-data analytics.

  • Computer Networks
  • Cloud Computing
  • Big Data
  • Resource Management
  • Distributed Systems
